page.title: 06ARABLE FARMING IN HALTON
page.content: Arable farming or crop husbandry is crop farming The most popular crops grown locally are wheat barley oats and potatoes.The crops are usually rotated every five years an example first year winter wheat,second year winter barley 3rd year sugar beat 4th year spring barley 5th year grass.The spring barley is used to make beer,winter wheat for bread making if it is good or animal feed on smaller farms they use a tractor and implemets to spread fertilizer but on larger farms an aeroplane may be used.The worst weather for the crops is heavy thunder storms. the wildlife in the fields include hares,rabbits,foxes,mice,partridges and pheasants.A scarecrow is used to scare away the birds.
